title: Dat moment when you want to play league

replies.body:
lol dude Im at the log in screen cause my fucking client decieded to take 90% of my CPU again for some reason so I had to task manager kill it.
Now i'm getting "server is currently busy"
fnsjadfhfsjaiofpasds

For real. I decide that i want some herb to help me enjoy league and ignore noobs, afks, and feeders, so I bus a round trip for over 3 hours to go to the dispensary. I come home to my roomates, all sitting their lazy butts around waiting for me to come with the goods. My bitch ass roommate who will be smoking my shit gets to continue playing while me who went out of my way to get this now can't play for who knows how long. f u 2 RITO

I feel ya man

Maybe burn some of it and offer it to the rito gods as a sacrifice.
